comments: Great Professor Period. She now teaches at City Tech (CUNY). You have to work hard even to pass this class as this is a pure Engineering class and Prof. Lili is very intensive.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Lectures are very boring and hard to pay attention to. Labs are tough but that\'s where you learn everything. Doesn\'t grade attendance, and all HW was counted as bonus only (not mandatory.) Tests are very difficult, but she grades them very kindly. Says she doesn\'t give partial credit, but she does. Language barrier makes communication tough.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Her class is pretty easy, she isnt too clear on explaining some stuff like circuits, but if you ask her for help you will get it. Cancels 2nd lab during the week if you finish the lab early.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Lili is a good choice. She can be hard to understand at times but she is extermely helpful and will make things clear whenever you ask a question. Her classes can be really funny and she is an easy grader.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is a great professor can be a little hard to understand at first but you will get used to her. Answer questions and stay after class to interact with her and ask more questions and she will love you. Showing up to class is a big thing with her so try to get to the class as much as possible. Her tests are really easy and straight from the HW.
